Name: Wildlife Planet: The Incremental
About the game: Tired and exhausted from your daily life? You may want to go to the wild and release yourself. Wildlife Planet is a brand new Idle & Simulation game in which you can walk into nature, embrace the wildlife and relieve your stress. There are several regions to be explored and hundreds of species cards to be unlocked. You can find more and more species as you level up. This is a game with refreshing scenes, immersive background music and different kinds of animals, plants, birds and insects. All regions and wildlife in the game are existing in the real world. And the descriptions of species cards are verified by professional biologists. It’s also a good way to learn popular science knowledge in this game. Game Features: * Names, taxonomies and descriptions verified by biologists to provide valuable and educational information. * Unlock and level up cards of different wildlife * Refreshing and relaxing graphics based on biology and geography * Immersive and healing background music * Numerous rewards in the game, drops, gems, treasure chests... * An ‘Expedition’ option to get extra rewards
